nodes.text: Jujiran Halbeet was a male Givin maintenance worker at the Yag'Dhul Ambassadorial Landing Platform.

While working at the Yag'Dhul Ambassadorial Landing Platform some time just prior to the outbreak of the Clone Wars, Halbeet spotted his co-worker, Gavrilonnis Tejere, as he attempted to commit an act of sabotage. Upon confronting Tejere, his co-worker shot Halbeet with a concealed blaster, with the force of the impact knocking him off the platform. Fortunately for Halbeet, Jedi Masters Mace Windu and Yoda were passing in an air taxi under the platform and caught him. The two masters then apprehended Tejere for his attempted crimes.
